con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="simpleprior" targetNamespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/einvoicing/simpleprior/v1_00" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://fsb.belgium.be/einvoicing/simpleprior/v1_00" xmlns:agg="urn:oasis:natns:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonAggregateComponents-2" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://fsb.belgium.be/einvoicing/simpleprior/v1_00" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified"> <xsd:element name="consumerId"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="submitDocument"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="document" type="tns:UBLDocumentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="submitDocumentResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ackIndicator" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="retrieveDocument"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="receiverId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="senderId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="documentType" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="documentId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="retrieveDocumentResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="receivedDate" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="document" type="tns:UBLDocumentType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="submitInboxRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="receiverId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="senderId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="submitInboxRequestResponse" type="tns:SubmitInboxRequestResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="UBLDocumentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any processContents="skip"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="DocumentReferenceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="receiverId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="senderId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="documentType" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="documentId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SubmitInboxRequestResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="documentGroup"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="documentReference" type="tns:DocumentReferenceType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="markDocument"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="receiverId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="senderId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="documentType" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> <xsd:element name="documentId" type="xsd:normalizedString"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="markDocumentResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ackIndicator" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="submitDocumentRequest"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="tns:submitDocument"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitDocumentResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:submitDocumentResponse" name="response"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="retrieveDocumentRequest"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="tns:retrieveDocument"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="retrieveDocumentResponse"> <wsdl:part name="response" element="tns:retrieveDocumentResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitInboxRequestRequest"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="tns:submitInboxRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitInboxRequestResponse"> <wsdl:part name="response" element="tns:submitInboxRequestResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="markDocumentRequest"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="tns:markDocument"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="markDocumentResponse"> <wsdl:part name="response" element="tns:markDocumentResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="simpleprior"> <wsdl:operation name="submitDocument"> <wsdl:input message="tns:submitDocumentRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:submitDocumentResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="retrieveDocument"> <wsdl:input message="tns:retrieveDocumentRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:retrieveDocumentResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="submitInboxRequest"> <wsdl:input message="tns:submitInboxRequestRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:submitInboxRequestResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="markDocument"> <wsdl:input message="tns:markDocumentRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:markDocumentResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="simplepriorSOAP" type="tns:simpleprior"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="submitInboxRequest"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="submitInboxRequest"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:consumerIdHeader" part="consumerId" use="literal"/> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body parts="response" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="retrieveDocument"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="retrieveDocument"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:consumerIdHeader" part="consumerId" use="literal"/> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body parts="response" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="submitDocument"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="submitDocument"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:consumerIdHeader" part="consumerId" use="literal"/> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body parts="response" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="markDocument"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="markDocument"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header message="tns:consumerIdHeader" part="consumerId" use="literal"/> <soap:body parts="body" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body parts="response" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="simpleprior"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:simplepriorSOAP" name="simplepriorSOAP"> <soap:address location="{{location}}"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
